translations.english_saheeh: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
translations.english_hilali_khan: When the earth is shaken with its (final) earthquake.
translations.english_rwwad: When the earth is shaken with a mighty quake,

translations.english_saheeh: And the earth discharges its burdens[1962]
translations.english_hilali_khan: And when the earth throws out its burdens.
translations.english_rwwad: and the earth throws out its burdens,

translations.english_saheeh: And man says,[1963] "What is [wrong] with it?" -
translations.english_hilali_khan: And man will say: "What is the matter with it?"
translations.english_rwwad: and man says, “What is the matter with it?”

translations.english_saheeh: That Day, it will report its news
translations.english_hilali_khan: That Day it will declare its information (about all that happened over it of good or evil).
translations.english_rwwad: On that Day it will recount all its news,

translations.english_saheeh: Because your Lord has inspired [i.e., commanded] it.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Because your Lord will inspire it.
translations.english_rwwad: because your Lord has inspired it [to do so].

arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1964]- From the place of Judgement to their final abode. Another interpretation is "emerge separately" (from the graves) .

translations.english_saheeh: That Day, the people will depart[1964] separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
translations.english_hilali_khan: That Day mankind will proceed in scattered groups that they may be shown their deeds.[1]
translations.english_rwwad: On that Day all people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds.

arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
phonetic: 99.7 Faman Ya`mal Mithqāla Dharratin Khayrāan Yarahu

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1965]- Or "the weight of a small ant."

translations.english_saheeh: So whoever does an atom's weight[1965] of good will see it,
translations.english_hilali_khan: So whosoever does good equal to the weight of an atom (or a small ant) shall see it.
translations.english_rwwad: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it,

arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
phonetic: 99.8 Wa Man Ya`mal Mithqāla Dharratin Sharrāan Yarahu

translations.english_saheeh: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
translations.english_hilali_khan: And whosoever does evil equal to the weight of an atom (or a small ant) shall see it.
translations.english_rwwad: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
